sen.j: 正親町三条 公治（おおぎまちさんじょう きんはる、嘉吉元年（1441年） - 明応4年3月12日 (旧暦)（1495年4月7日））は、室町時代の公卿。
sen.e: Kinharu OGIMACHISANJO (1441 - April 7, 1495) was a Kugyo (a top court official) in the Muromachi period.

sen.j: 後花園天皇（102代）・後土御門天皇（103代）の二帝にわたり仕えた廷臣で官位は正二位権大納言まで昇った。
sen.e: He was a retainer of Imperial Court who served two generations: Emperor GoHanazono (102th) and Emperor Gotsuchimikado (103th), and his highest official court rank was Shonii Dainagon (Senior Second Rank, major counsellor).

sen.e: He became jiju (a chamberlain), Konoefu (the Headquarters of the Inner Palace Guards), Konoefu, Shimotsuke Province, and Kurodo no to (Head Chamberlain), and finally became Sangi (councillor) in 1458 to rank with Kugyo.

sen.e: After that, he became Echizen no kuni no kami (Governor of Echizen Province), Sanuki no kuni no kami, and Chunagon (middle counsellor) and then Dainagon (major counsellor) in 1481, and served until 1489.
